Package org.sopra.api.command

Interface AdjustmentCommand

All Superinterfaces:
Command
All Known Subinterfaces:
AdjustConsumerCommand, AdjustProducerCommand
public interface AdjustmentCommand
extends Command
Extends the command interface with some information that is required to adjust either the provided or required power if the corresponding energy node is controllable.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void assign()
    Assigns adjustment command for execution in the next round.
    int getAmount()
    Amount of energy by which is going to be adjusted.

  • Method Details

    • assign

      void assign() throws org.sopra.exceptions.CannotAssignCommandException
      Assigns adjustment command for execution in the next round. A command can only be assigned once during execution phase.
      Throws:
      org.sopra.exceptions.CannotAssignCommandException - If adjustment command is already assigned or sum of requested amount and provided or required energy level falls below 0 or exceeds the maximum energy level

    • getAmount

      int getAmount()
      Amount of energy by which is going to be adjusted. The provided/required power of the target energy node is increased if amount is positive and decreased if amount is negative.
      Returns:
      Amount of energy which is going to be adjusted
